title: Five of Wands
desc:
Post 1705
- You must choose a player with the same number of cards as yourself (excluding this one), or you cannot play this card.
- Both you and your target will draw 1 card.
- Then, each of you will add together the Post Numbers of each card in your respective hands in order to calculate a Score.
- Whoever has the highest Score gets to discard any three cards of their choosing.
